headline.main: BOLIVIA WELCOMED INTO UNITED NATIONS; Secretary Hull Greets New Partner Against the Axis

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 1 -- Bolivia was welcomed into the family of the United Nations in consequence of her formal adherence to the Declaration of the United Nations through a note made public today from Secretary of State Cordell Hull to Tomas Manuel Elio, the Bolivian Foreign Minister.
abstract: Welcomes Bolivia as United Nations member
